Jump and Branch test
001000 00000 00100 00000 00000 000011 #addi r4 = r0 + 3
001000 00000 00101 00000 00000 000001 #addi r5 = r0 + 1
000100 00100 00000 00000 00000 000010 #beq r4 = r0? jump to 2 instruction ahead.
000000 00100 00101 00100 00000 100010 #sub r5 = r4 - r5
000010 00000 00000 00000 00000 000010 #jump back to the branch test
001000 00000 00100 11111 11111 111100 #addi r4 = r0 - 4
000000 00100 00101 00100 00000 100000 #add r4 = r4 + r5
000001 00001 00001 00000 00000 000001 #bgez r1 >= 0? jump 1 instructions
000010 00000 00000 00000 00000 000110 #jump to instruction 6
